content: repeat these two row 15 16 17 times and then repeat round 1 once more heel turn by starting the heel turn with a purl row you eliminate the need to knit back at the end of the heel turn and are ready to pick the gusset stitches s1 p15 17 19 p2tog p1 turn s1 k4 4 6 ssk k1 turn s1 p5 5 7 p2tog p1 turn s1 k6 6 8 ssk k1 turn continue in this manner until all stitches have been worked the last row will be a knit row and there will be 17 19 21 stitches worked gusset pick up 15 16 17 stitches along the heel flap and 1 extra stitch in the corner of the instep knit across the instep if you ended on round 2 of the thermal pattern when you started the heel flap this will be round 3 of the thermal pattern pick up the same number of stitches along the other side of the heel flap knit across 8 9 10 stitches and place a marker this is now the beginning of each round during the gusset decreases round 1 knit 9 10 11 ktbl 15 16 17 knit across the remaining stitches after the marker knit the stitches that you picked up along the heel flap through the back loop this will give them a twist and prevent any holes knit the stitch that you picked up in the corner of the instep with the first stitch on the instep knit across the instep round 4 of the thermal pattern knit the last stitch of the instep with the extra stitch you picked up in the corner ktbl 15 16 17 knit the stitches you picked up on this side of the heel flap through the back loop knit 8 9 10 you should be back at the stitch marker that indicates this round is completed round 2 decrease round the instep should now be on round one of the thermal pattern continue the instep in pattern for the heel stitches knit until 3 stitches remain before the instep k2tog k1 knit the instep in pattern k1 ssk knit to the end of the round round 3 heel stitches are knit and instep stitches are knit in pattern repeat round 2 and 3 until there are 29 33 35 stitches left on the heel needle the instep needle has 31 33 37 stitches foot continue pattern on instep and knit until the sock is 2 inches shorter than desired toe for size small only on the instep needle k1 ssk k25 k2tog k1 sole knit for size large only on the instep needle k1 ssk k31 k2tog k1 sole knit for all sizes instep knit sole knit there are now 29 33 35 stitches on both needles round 1 k1 ssk knit to last three stitches k2tog k1 round 2 knit repeat these two rounds until 15 stitches remain on each needle graft stitches using kitchener stitch
